description: Babka means grandmother in Polish. It's traditionally eaten at Easter but is lovely at any time with a coffee. It's a bread / cake without any kneading.
name: Lemon Babka Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: When cooked remove from bundt pan and pour icing over top. Can add slivered almonds or chopped nuts.
